game.template.bufferstrategy

Class GameAudio

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.template.bufferstrategy.GameAudio

  • public class GameAudio
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles musics of the game, plays music of menu when game starts, plays music of the background, music of "zombies are coming" and music of end of game after losing or winning.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameAudio()
      Constructs a new gameAudio and sets music links.

    • Method Summary

      Plays and stops background music.
      void playEndGame(boolean play)
      when player loses or wins, plays the end game music
      void playMenu(boolean play)
      Plays music of the menu
      void playZombiesComing(GameState state)
      When Zombies are coming plays the proper clip

    • Method Detail

      • setBackground

        public void setBackground()
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                          javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
        Sets background music
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - as exception
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - as exception
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - as exception

      • playBackGround

        public void playBackGround(GameState state,
                           boolean leave,
                           boolean gameOver)
        Plays and stops background music. Plays when game starts, stops and closes the clip when game finished or player leaves the game
        Parameters:
        state - as gameState
        leave - if player leaves the game this will be true.
        gameOver - if player loses the game this will be true.

      • playZombiesComing

        public void playZombiesComing(GameState state)
        When Zombies are coming plays the proper clip
        Parameters:
        state - as game state

      • playMenu

        public void playMenu(boolean play)
        Plays music of the menu
        Parameters:
        play: - when it is true, it means that music should be played and when it is false it means that the music should be stopped

      • playEndGame

        public void playEndGame(boolean play)
        when player loses or wins, plays the end game music
        Parameters:
        play: - true when game finished, false when player clicks main menu button
